title: Poster, "Moore Colege of Art Faculty Exhibition", 1972
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Imprinted in black upper right corner along edge: photography / design lawrence bach
inscribed:
Printed below image at left: M      CA / moore / college of art. In black lower left center: Faculty Exhibition / 20th and Race Streets / Philadelphia / Pennsylvania 10103. In black lower right center: Reception: 15 September 1972 / 7 - 9 PM / 15 September - 2 October 1972.
Lower right two columns list the faculty:
Harry Anderson / Lawrence Bach / Janette Banks / John Benson / Betsy Bess / Joyce Borden / David Bowman / Mayo Bryce / Ranulph Bye / Victor Carlson / John Costanze / Gerald Crimmins / Jack Curl / Charles Fahlen / Frieda Fehrenbacher / William Freedland  / Elizabeth Ginsberg / Doyla Goutman / John Hanlon / Jack Henderson / Mildred Ivans /Diana Jackson / Marian Elias Jackson 
second column: Harold Jacobs / Robert Koffler / Beth Kush / Libbie Lovett / Leonard Nelson / Peter North / Mario Prisco / Joan Redmond / Bill Richards / Hilda Schoenwetter / Edward Shenton / Judy Skoogfors / Leif Skoogfors / Andrew Synder / Louise Stahl / Karl Stirner / Loraine Surnitsky / Louise Todd / Kenneth Vavrek / William Walton / Mac Wells / H. Theo Young
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: A series of photographic images, ranging from black at left to gray at right, arranged in vertical rectangles and squares.  The images are photographic close-ups of fragments of cloth, creating a lyrical, abstracted curvelinear pattern across the sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Moore Colege of Art Faculty Exhibition", 1972.
1972. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-221.
